texts.name: Haggash
texts.biography: Haggash, an orphan found wandering in the steppes near Qutugh during the Year of the Sea of Manes, was taken in by a tribe of Centaurs and raised as one of them. Once a leader of Centaur troops, she found Erathian Centaurs to be much less fearsome than she had hoped. She subsequently turned her interest to taming a much more ferocious 4-legged beast: the multi-headed Hydra.

specialty.name: Hydras
specialty.description: Increases the Speed of allied Hydras, Chaos Hydras, and Ruinous Hydras by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 20% for every 7 levels (rounded up).
